price: Sois vós que a fazeis descer dos nimbos, ou somos Nós Que a fazemos descer?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
